about_the_game:
A 90's style retro Speed-Run Platformer.

Race through jungles and delve into temples.

Avoiding traps and enemies to reach the exit before the Jaguar Sun goes down...

  • 2 Playable Levels in this Demo.

  • Old-school gameplay.

  • In-game saving.

  • Retro Pixel art style.
detailed_description:
A 90's style retro Speed-Run Platformer.

Race through jungles and delve into temples.

Avoiding traps and enemies to reach the exit before the Jaguar Sun goes down...

  • 2 Playable Levels in this Demo.

  • Old-school gameplay.

  • In-game saving.

  • Retro Pixel art style.
name: Jaguar Suns Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 | AMD Radeon R9 380
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 | AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Race through progressive levels in this SNES/SEGA style 90's retro speed-run platformer.
